text: ‘This that you see is what you were promised read tū‘adūna or third person plural yū‘adūna ‘they were promised’ in the world and what follows substitutes for li’l-muttaqīna ‘for the God-fearing’ — it is for every penitent one for every person reverting after sin to obedience of God who is mindful mindful of the bounds of God’s religion
